Translations.Text: The unbelievers say, “What, when we become dust, we and our ancestors, will we really be raised from the dead
“Indeed we were promised this, as well as our ancestors before us. But these are nothing but tales of the ancient.”
Say, “Go through the earth and see what the end of those guilty of wrongdoing was.”
But do not grieve over them, nor distress yourself because of their plans
They also say, “When will this promise come if you are truthful?”
Say, “It may be that some of the events which you wish to hasten are close.”
But indeed your Lord is full of grace to humanity, yet most of them are ungrateful
And indeed your Lord knows all that their hearts hide as well as all that they reveal
Nor is anything hidden in heaven or on earth, except what is in a clear record
Indeed this Quran explains to the Children of Israel much of the matters which they disagree
And indeed it is a guide and a mercy to those who believe
Indeed your Lord will decide between them by His decree, and He is Exalted in Might, All Knowing
So put your trust in God, for you are on the path of manifest truth
Truly you cannot cause the dead to listen, nor can you cause the deaf to hear the call, as they turn back in retreat
Nor can you be a guide to the blind, to prevent them from straying. Only those will listen who believe in Our signs, and they should all be considered muslim
And when the word is proven against them, we will produce from the earth a creature to face them. He will speak to them because humanity did not believe with assurance in Our signs
